Package utils

Klasse PermissionChecker

java.lang.Object
utils.PermissionChecker
public class PermissionChecker extends Object
The `PermissionChecker` class provides a utility method for checking user permissions.

  • Methodendetails

    • checkPermissions

      public static boolean checkPermissions(Login user, int perms)
      Checks the permissions of a user against a specified permission level.
      Parameter:
      user - The user to check the permissions for.
      perms - The required permission level.
      Gibt zurück:
      `true` if the user has sufficient permissions, `false` otherwise.
